name: NU_PoliovirusInfectionTestsForPoliovirusAntibodyTiterinAcuteAndConvalescentSerumSpecimens
title: NU_Poliovirus Infection (Tests for poliovirus Antibody Titer in Acute and Convalescent Serum Specimens)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of poliovirus antibody in Acute and Convalescent Serum Specimens)),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Poliovirus Ab Titer, serum, 1st and 2nd specimens),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
